modName: Lances Expanded Whitewatch Tower with playerhome
summary: Small fortification with guards and playerhome, offering all necessary services
descriptionHtml:
Expanded the Whitewatch Tower north of Whiterun (NOT the one from the mainquest) to a small keep with Playerhome.
I made this mod for myself because i didnt find a Housemod for my liking, i hope you like it too :D

Added:
*Stonewall arround the spot
*LVL 40 AI Follower
*Playerhome
*Alchemy and Smithing Vendor
*Ambient Guards
*Mannequin + Weapondisplay
*Workbenches
*Horses ready to ride
*updated navmesh
and more...

I uploaded it on the steamworkshop aswell, but i know not everyone can access it :p so cant a friend of mine and i added it to the nexus, my favorite site for elder scrolls downloads :D

enjoy, ve fun, if you like it plz rate, if you dont like plz post comments and ideas and help me to improve!


The vid is made of a older version, i had to remove the gates showing in the vid, they caused a weired fasttravel bug,..   some more changes to detail were added later like weaponracks etc...

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lGxgRxeVaQ4
author: LanceVegas
